column4: Anyone know how to fix my Ubuntu theme problem? :( It keeps going back to default on logouts or reboots.
how are you adding the theme
The theme I am using I added with Synaptic Package Manager. It is a normal Ubuntu Theme.
how are you applying the theme?
Did you have any ideas on that? Or maybe any luck googling? I personally couldn't find a fix, but I didn't search THAT hard I guess.
My Ubuntu theme. Keeps going back to default.
if you are launching stuff with sudo / gsudo it wont stick
you could make sure you have write access to the theme files
How would I go about doing that?
That was another thing I was wondering about, because one of the themes I did install, I can't delete. But the theme I want to keep, won't stay.
its hard to have to leaf through so much text without highlighting
I was just being sarcastic. Hehe.
Still there? I have an update on my theme issue. I tried a different theme, and rebooted gnome, and it stayed. Is there perhaps something simply wrong with the theme I chose?
